name: Moon solitude
description:
Moon solitude is a game made in a few days for the UDC JAM 25 https://itch.io/jam/udc-jam-25. 

It's an exploration-adventure game and it's very short.

You can play it online or download it:

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-322562

HOW TO PLAY:

You can move using the direction arrows.

You can jump with the Up arrow.

When you obtain the Gravitational boots you can use them with the Down arrow. With this item you can break some parts of the ground if you jump from high enough height and use the item.

When you obtain the jet pack you can use it to propel yourself pressing the Spacebar.

When you obtain the hook you can use the X key to throw and break some fragile walls.

When you obtain the radio you can use the R key to use it.

This is my first game published, so any feedback or comments apreciated!!
